Package com.multi_threaded_http_web_server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
com.multi_threaded_http_web_server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends Object
implements Runnable
The ClientHandler class that is responsible for handling the client's HTTP request and response related.
Author:
Hodaifa98.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    HTTPRequest client_http_request
    Client's HTTPRequest object containing all information about the request to the Server.
    HTTPResponse client_http_response
    Client's HTTPResponse object containing all information about the response to the client.

  • Constructor Summary

    The ClientHandler class's main constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run()
    Overriding the default run method of the Runnable interface.
    In here, a method will be invoked to handle the incoming HTTP request from a client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(Socket s, BufferedReader br, DataOutputStream dos)
      The ClientHandler class's main constructor.
      Parameters:
      s - The client's socket.
      br - The BufferedReader assigned to the client socket's input stream.
      dos - The DataOutputStream of the client's socket.
